text: <@U024L8W0MB6> Sorry to throw back to an old thread, but is there anyway `icontains` could be added to the documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/content/data-driven-content/graphql/query-HubSpot-data-using-graphql#query-argument-types|here>? We've been looking for this solution for a very, very long time :sweat_smile:
